attributes.action: Prevent Foreign owned media in the United Kingdom from attempting to Influence Politicians or the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Large Parts of the British Media are owned by foreign individuals and companies. But in this modern age, Newspapers and television can be used to influence both the electorate and the elected. This is undemocratic as people not eligible to vote in UK elections may have an influence on UK Policy directions. It should also be an offence to deliberately lie or mislead in a newspaper or other media that is charged for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
